name: Abyssal Dark
description:
Abyssal Dark

2D side scrolling bullet hell shooter made in 10days for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022
Whats more confined that an underwater cave?

Controls

W,A,S,D Keys to Move
Aim with the MOUSE
Press Left to SHOOT
ESC - Pause

Credits

Blood Jackal 23

MrScientist

Using the Bullet Fury Asset Bullet Fury Unity Asset
Music by Joel Steudler
